DOC.brief_title: Validation Clinical Application Dysphagia Screening Questionnaire
DOC.detailed_description: The dysphagia screen questionnaire stage validation - translation back translation , review translation back translation committee , pre-test study ( 36 person ) monolingual individual test re-test study ( 67 subject include ) . The case - control study group test use dysphagia screen questionnaire clinical screen - water drink test . Barthel index nutrition questionnaire use identify nutritional functional state . M. D. Anderson dysphagia inventory questionnaire , sf-12 questionnaire use assess dysphagia effect quality life . The research group consist two subgroup - 171 nursing home resident 3 different nursing home 82 outpatient Hospital Lithuanian University Health Sciences . The control group consist randomly select 40 community-dwelling elderly healthy individual .
